original: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe na neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā ekatiṁsa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhavīsa, adhipatiyā ekūnatiṁsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekatisa ārammaṇe aṭṭhavīsa adhipatiyā ekūnatisa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekatisa
